<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataGD extends data { const CODE = 'GD'; const PREFIX = 1; const REGION = 'North America'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:473|[58]\d\d|900)\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '473(?:2(?:3[0-2]|69)|3(?:2[89]|86)|4(?:[06]8|3[5-9]|4[0-49]|5[5-79]|73|90)|63[68]|7(?:58|84)|800|938)\d{4}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '473(?:4(?:0[2-79]|1[04-9]|2[0-5]|58)|5(?:2[01]|3[3-8])|901)\d{4}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '8(?:00|33|44|55|66|77|88)[2-9]\d{6}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '900[2-9]\d{6}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), '5(?:00|2[12]|33|44|66|77|88)[2-9]\d{6}'=>array( 'personal_number', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1-$2', '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1-$2-$3', ); }
